headline: Ahead Of Uber Earnings, Analyst Raises Forecast
summary: BofA Securities analyst Justin Post maintained a Buy rating on Uber Technologies, Inc (NYSE:UBER) with a price target of $96, up from $95 on Sunday. Uber will report its quarterly earnings results on May 7 before the market opens. For the first quarter, Post’s bookings and revenue estimates were $43.5 billion, and $11.73 billion were higher than the Street estimates of $42.9 billion and $11.62 billion. Also Read: Autonomous Ride-Hailing Just Got Real: VW And Uber Reveal First US City The analyst

headline: Uber and WeRide Expand Strategic Partnership to Bring Autonomous Vehicles to 15 More Cities
summary: SAN FRANCISCO & GUANGZHOU, China, May 05, 2025--Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER), the world’s largest mobility and delivery platform, and WeRide (NASDAQ: WRD), a global leader in autonomous driving technology, today announced a significant expansion of their previously announced strategic partnership, adding 15 additional cities globally over the next five years, including in Europe. headline: 1-800-Flowers.com® Blooms on Uber Eats, Making Gifting Easier This Mother’s Day
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, May 05, 2025--Today Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) and 1-800-Flowers.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: FLWS) announced an expansion of their partnership that brings 1-800-Flowers’ iconic floral arrangements and gifts directly to the Uber Eats app—just in time for Mother’s Day. This collaboration builds on the companies’ existing relationship through Uber Direct, which powers same-day delivery for flower orders placed directly on 1-800-Flowers.com.

headline: Why Uber Rallied Double-Digits in April
summary: Uber made news with several autonomous driving companies in April.  The flurry of partnerships seems to be easing concerns about autonomy's potential disruptive impact on Uber's business.  In addition, Uber's CEO said he hasn't seen recessionary impacts as a result of tariffs.
